title: Pixel 3a XL 'No SIM Card' and no connection to my carrier (Verizon)
content:
My phone has lost the ability to connect with my provider, often giving a 'No SIM Card' message in the top left lock screen and a unconnected x where there would be bars. When trying to make a call it tells me to disable airplane mode, but airplane mode isn't on. As a result I cannot make calls/text nor access mobile data. In the *#*#4636#*# menu 'Mobile Radio Power' can be turned on, but turns itself off.

I've tried the troubleshooting steps, safe mode, different SIM, resetting the network, factory reset etc. to no avail.
category: Connectivity, Network, Bluetooth, Google Pixel 3a XL
